item.title: Calculate Insert Size Metrics Faster
item.description: Picard tools is a great set of utilities by the Broad Institute for performing sequence analysis. however, some of the utilities run on the slower side. To speed things up, I created a new command: insert-size as part of seq-collection. The command runs much faster, owing in part to parallelization of insert-size calculations. insert-size does not operate in exactly the same way as picard CollectInsertSizeMetrics, but the results are very close.
